resources.string:
Voluntold is an app that can help you find local organizations looking for volunteers! 

In our app you can: 
- Express interest in various opportunities posted to our app 

- Request evaluations from organizations you volunteered for 

- Create a custom volunteer resume to send to organizations you are interested in volunteering for

Voluntold is an app that can help your local organization find volunteers to help you in your cause! 

In our app you can: 
- Post various volunteer opportunities sponsored by your organization 

- Find students interested in volunteering with your organization and contact them 

- Submit evaluations for students that volunteered for you upon their request
